resources.name: One Click Create Group
resources.description:
* Calling the 'One Click Create Group' request will create a group and attach that group to the user that created the group .
* This request is mandatory for the others 'One Click' .
* In order for the request to work properly, in the Sandbox environment, you need to have a valid "bearer_token"
* Sending this request it will set the 'group_id' value in the Sandbox environment
* For more detailed information you can look at the Preview for the requests that were used.
* Each time the request is sent, a new group is created and attached to the current user.

resources.name: One Click Create Demo Identity Network and DataProducts
resources.description:
* Calling the 'One Click Create Demo Identity Network and DataProducts' request will create the following Identity Network with Data Products:
![Demo Identity Network](https://developer.oftrust.net/media/images/Insomnia-Demo-Identity_Network_-_Identity_Netw.width-800_1Mu5mgr.jpg)
* For this request to work, you need first to send the 'One Click Create Group' request.
* This request is mandatory for the 'One Click Test Demo DataProducts' request.
* For more detailed information you can look at the Preview for the requests that were used.
* Each time the request is sent, a new Identity Network with Data Products is created

body.text:

	"name": "One Click Create Demo Identity Network",

	"Create Room1": "{% response 'body', 'req_70ab7b4604574164b301dfea9b3af330', 'b64::JFsiQGlkIl0=::46b', 'always' %}",

	"Create Room2": "{% response 'body', 'req_c9a32ff48b234b6a87a152d89c30538c', 'b64::JFsiQGlkIl0=::46b', 'always' %}",
	"Create Link of type 'BelongsTo' between Room2 and Floor": "{% response 'body', 'req_b6dc602e5f4f49ed93579070cfbb894e', 'b64::JFsiQGlkIl0=::46b', 'always' %}",
	"Create CO2 Sensor3 Identity": "{% response 'body', 'req_54eeca58ffcc4271a5fdf45988ec2577', 'b64::JFsiQGlkIl0=::46b', 'always' %}",
	"Create Link of type 'BelongsTo' between CO2 Sensor3 and Room2": "{% response 'body', 'req_f55b5862fc484ec1898e5ac828a81f3f', 'b64::JFsiQGlkIl0=::46b', 'always' %}",
	"Create Temperature Sensor4 Identity": "{% response 'body', 'req_fc9a86f481404079a8aaf826d3289a6c', 'b64::JFsiQGlkIl0=::46b', 'always' %}",
	"Create Link of type 'BelongsTo' between Temperature Sensor4 and Room2": "{% response 'body', 'req_14158a2b512d420bbd1460014ee3ea20', 'b64::JFsiQGlkIl0=::46b', 'always' %}",
	"Create Data Product1 for CO2": "{% response 'body', 'req_8b9d034a81134c3db3392362bf486e77', 'b64::JC5pZGVudGl0eUlk::46b', 'always' %}",
	"Create Data Product2 for Temperature": "{% response 'body', 'req_df32481c563c40c5af841832b6f7e419', 'b64::JC5pZGVudGl0eUlk::46b', 'always' %}",

resources.name: One Click Test Demo DataProducts
resources.description:
* Calling the 'One Click Test Demo DataProducts' will create an application and based on that application client secret and access_token that are saved in the Sandbox environment is going to send a call to the BrokerAPI for each Data Product created by the last request of 'One Click Create Demo Identity Network and DataProducts'
* For this request to work, you need first to send the 'One Click Create Demo Identity Network and DataProducts' request
- Fetch harmonized data from a Data Product, which requires installing and using the following additional plugins: 
	* [plugin-platform-of-trust](insomnia://plugins/install?name=@platform-of-trust/insomnia-plugin-platform-of-trust)
	* [plugin-customtimestamp](insomnia://plugins/install?name=insomnia-plugin-customtimestamp)
* For more detailed information you can look at the Preview for the requests that were used.
